desc: 30% boost to max HP, Rec, greatly recovers HP each turn & probable great HP recovery when attacked

dictionary.lore: An ancient red pearl found in the ruins of the Agni Empire. Long ago, the Agni Empire saw itself threatened by the rage of a fire dragon. The emperor at the time ordered his soldiers to slay the dragon, but as soon as they met the dragon's gaze, their bodies were set ablaze. This treasure is said to have been made from the eyes of this fire dragon, which had the ability to heal its own wounds by incinerating its enemies.

name: Dragon Eye
